verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You can have my heart
You can have it all
I'm laying down my life
No matter what the cost

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Only Jesus all my days
No greater treasure, no sweeter name
The cross before me, the world behind
I have decided only Jesus

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
No turning back
No turning back
I have decided only Jesus
